Name: BreakBlast
About the game: A brick-breaking style game with lots of VFX, colors and inspired on retrowave style Amazing Power-Ups to make your gameplay more pleasant and destroy blocks faster Fight Bosses at the end of each world to be able to progress on the game Break blocks, power-up, score, fight bosses and then break some more blocks. Use all your ability to get to the end of this game with the highest score. The level design and bosses will give you a challenge to maintain your score and your lives. Are you fast? You'll need to be on BreakBlast! Featuring: - Retrowave inspired concept with minimalistic art style; - Original retrowave inspired soundtrack; - 33 levels carefully designed with progressive difficulty; - Power-Ups that give you advantages and new ways to progress; - Boss Fight in each different world. BreakBlast is a brick-breaking game that fuses the nostalgic arcade experience with retrowave inspired visuals and soundtrack. It doesn't matter if you are a harcore or casual player, you will enjoy BreakBlast!
